rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/biography?rev=1426272745">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2015-03-13T14:52:25-04:00</dc:date>         <dc:creator>leonb</dc:creator>         <title>biography</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/biography?rev=1426272745</link>         <description>Biography    L\ufffd\ufffdon was born in 1965 in Saint Germain du Teil, Loz\ufffd\ufffdre near the Aubrac plateau. He spent his childhood in La Canourgue and attended school in Rodez and Clermont-Ferrand, then in \ufffd\ufffdcole Sainte Genevi\ufffd\ufffdve, Versailles. He received the Dipl\ufffd\ufffdme d'Ing\ufffd\ufffdnieur de l'\ufffd\ufffdcole Polytechnique (X84) in 1987,  the Magist\ufffd\ufffdre de Math\ufffd\ufffdmatiques Fondamentales et Appliqu\ufffd\ufffdes et d'Informatique from</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/start?rev=1426271929">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2015-03-13T14:38:49-04:00</dc:date>         <dc:creator>leonb</dc:creator>         <title>start</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/start?rev=1426271929</link>         <description>Welcome    I am a research scientist with broad interests in practical and theoretical machine learning. My work on large scale learning and stochastic gradient algorithms has received attention in the recent years. I am also known for the DjVu document compression system. I joined Facebook AI Research in March 2015.  Use the sidebar to navigate this site.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/galleries/alyosha-2014/start?rev=1424892547">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2015-02-25T14:29:07-04:00</dc:date>         <dc:creator>leonb</dc:creator>         <title>galleries:alyosha-2014:start</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/galleries/alyosha-2014/start?rev=1424892547</link>         <description>Photos d'Aliosha  Novembre 2014  D\ufffd\ufffdcembre 2014  Janvier 2015  F\ufffd\ufffdvrier 2015</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/?image=galleries%3Aalyosha-2014%3A15020581.jpg&ns=galleries%3Aalyosha-2014&rev=1424892236&do=media">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2015-02-25T14:23:56-04:00</dc:date>         <dc:creator>leonb</dc:creator>         <title>galleries:alyosha-2014:15020581.jpg -
